name: EBAN ASBL - The European Trade Association for Business Angels, Seed Funds and Early Stage Market Players
goal: EBAN is the pan-European representative for the early stage investor community gathering over 150 member organizations in more than 50 countries today. Established in 1999 by a group of pioneer angel networks in Europe with the collaboration of the European Commission and EURADA, EBAN represents a sector estimated to invest 11.4 billion Euros a year and playing a vital role in Europe’s future, notably in the funding of SMEs. EBAN fuels Europe’s growth through the creation of wealth and jobs.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Capital Markets Union
Digital Single Market
Connecting SMEs to private investors
Harmonising regulations
